resources.name: Smart City Lights application

pricing.description: This price plan defines an initial payment and a pay-per-use model based on issues created
pricing.label: Initial payment + pay per issue price plan

resources.longDescription: Smart City Lights application is a valuable utility for incidents management and control of Smart City entities. The user has two different mashups that serve as a UI for the back-end application and leverage on a number of FI-WARE generic enablers. One of the mashups facilitates the real-time management of incidents, while the other allows for the analysis of historical information gathered from each of Smart City entities.
resources.shortDescription: Smart City Lights is an application that allows the management and analysis of Smart City entities status.
